description:
Only one field may be specified.

monitoring.uss_qualifier.resources.flight_planning.flight_intent.FlightIntentsSpecification, as defined in monitoring/uss_qualifier/resources/flight_planning/flight_intent.py

$ref.description: Path to content that replaces the $ref

file.description: Location of file to load, containing a FlightIntentCollection

intent_collection.description: Full flight intent collection, or a $ref to an external file containing a FlightIntentCollection.
